references.paper_title:
Asymptotic behavior of 
 l_p-based Laplacian regularization in semi-supervised
 learning
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical analysis of the asymptotic behavior of Laplace learning algorithms, which is crucial to understanding the limitations of Laplace learning in low label-rate regimes.

references.paper_title: Poisson learning: Graph based semi-supervised learning at very low label rates
references.reason: This paper introduces Poisson learning, a state-of-the-art method for graph-based semi-supervised learning that addresses the degeneracy of Laplace learning at low label rates.

references.paper_title: Auction dynamics: A volume constrained MBO scheme
references.reason: This paper presents a volume-constrained Merriman-Bence-Osher (MBO) scheme, which is relevant to the cardinality-constrained graph partitioning problem addressed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: An efficient heuristic procedure for partitioning graphs
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces an efficient heuristic for graph partitioning, which serves as a basis for many graph-based algorithms, including those used in semi-supervised learning.

references.paper_title: Semi-supervised learning using Gaussian fields and harmonic functions
references.reason: This seminal paper introduces Laplace learning, a widely used algorithm for graph-based semi-supervised learning, and provides the foundation for many subsequent improvements and extensions.
